data.name: plFlow_ImageFocus.Help
data.value: Sets the numbers of images on each side of the focussed one

data.name: plFlow_GalleryStyle.Help
data.value: Enter gallery style. You can change property like background-color/text-align/margin as your wish. But don't change "position:relative;" property.

data.name: lblItem.Text
data.value: Specify listings which will be displayed in slideshow

data.name: plFlow_ImagesCursor.Help
data.value: Sets the cursor type for all images default is 'default'

data.name: plFlow_HeightReflection.Help
data.value: Sets the height of the reflection in % of the source image

data.name: plFlow_SliderCursor.Help
data.value: Sets the slider cursor type: try "e-resize" default is 'default'

data.name: plFlow_SliderWidth.Help
data.value: Sets the px width of the slider div

data.name: plFlow_ImageWidth.Help
data.value: Enter image width you want display. Module will generate a new image with reflection effect based this value.

data.name: Tip_Category.Text
data.value: Specifies the categories from which products are displayed. Uncheck all of them will display products from all categories

data.name: plFlow_HighSlideEffect.Help
data.value: If this option is checked. You can single click the centered image or double click any image in the gallery and it will highslide. The highslided image can be arranged by drag 'n drop anywhere on the website. Note, it will override image link property.

data.name: plFlow_ImageFocusM.Help
data.value: multiplicator for the focussed image size in percent.

data.name: plLinkTarget.Help
data.value: Choose how to open image link.

data.name: plFlow_PreloadImages.Help
data.value: disables / enables the loading bar and image preloading

data.name: plFlow_StartAnimation.Help
data.value: Animate images moving in from the right on startup

data.name: plFlow_StartId.Help
data.value: Glide to this image number on startup. Note, you should enter a value which lower than image count.

data.name: plFlow_XStep.Help
data.value: step width on the x-axis in px

data.name: plTemplate.Help
data.value: Template locates under DesktopModules/CrossClassified/Template/Product/Slideshow, you can customize your own templates.

data.name: plFlow_AspectRatio.Help
data.value: Aspect ratio of the Carrousel Flow container (width divided by height), default value is 1.964.

data.name: plFlow_ImagesHeight.Help
data.value: Height of the images div container in percent. Default value is 0.67.

data.name: plFlow_ImagesM.Help
data.value: Multiplicator for all images in percent. Default value is 1.0

data.name: plFlow_PercentLandscape.Help
data.value: Scale landscape format, default value is 118.

data.name: plFlow_PercentOther.Help
data.value: Scale portrait and square format. Default value is 100.

data.name: plFlow_ScrollbarP.Help
data.value: Width of the scrollbar in percent.Default value is 0.6.

data.name: plFlow_BackgroundBlack.Help
data.value: Enter black value of background color (0-255).

data.name: plFlow_BackgroundGreen.Help
data.value: Enter green value of background color (0-255).

data.name: plFlow_BackgroundRed.Help
data.value: Enter red value of background color (0-255).

data.name: plFlow_AnimationSpeed.Help
data.value: Animation speed in ms, default value is 50

data.name: plFlow_SlideshowAutoplay.Help
data.value: Toggle automatic slideshow play on startup,works when "Slideshow" option is checked.

data.name: plFlow_SlideshowSpeed.Help
data.value: Time between slides in ms.Works when "Slideshow" option is checked, default value is 1500

data.name: plFlow_EnableReflection.Help
data.value: Check to enable create a reflection based slide image. Note, module can only create reflection for site images.

data.name: Tip_Flow_EnableReflection.Text
data.value: Check to enable create a reflection based slide image. Note, module can only create reflection for site images.

data.name: Tip_Flow_GalleryStyle.Text
data.value:
Enter gallery style. You can change property like background-color/text-align/margin as your wish. But don't change "position:relative;" property.
  Note, the carrousel flow gallery will automatic resize based skin pane size (where it is put into). You can manually add "width" property in "Gallery Style" to limit its width. For example, append "width:600px" in gallery style will limit its width to 600px.

data.name: Tip_Flow_HighSlideEffect.Text
data.value: If this option is checked, you can single click the centered image or double click any image in the gallery and it will high slide. The highslided image can be arranged by drag 'n drop anywhere on the website. Note, it will override image link property.

data.name: plRandomDisplay.Help
data.value: Check "random display" option to sort slides random. Note, if this option is checked, module will ignore other sort settings like "Sort by Product Name".

data.name: Tip_RandomDisplay.Text
data.value: Check "random display" option to sort slides random (show different slide sequence when page loads). Note, if this option is checked, module will ignore other sort settings like "Sort by Product Name".

data.name: plCategory.Help
data.value: Specifies the categories from which products are displayed. Uncheck all of them will display products from all categories

data.name: plDetailTab.Help
data.value: Select which page to display product detail, that page should have a Cp_Product_Detail module instance on it. If you don't specify it, module will use the default detail tab specify for selectd product department.

data.name: plFeatured.Help
data.value: Check to display only products for which the featured checkbox has been checked

data.name: plRows.Help
data.value: Enter product rows that will display in slideshow.

data.name: Tip_DetailTab.Text
data.value: Select which page to display product detail, that page should have a Cp_Product_Detail module instance on it. If you don't specify it, module will use the default detail page for selected department (which specified in "Cp_Admin sub module - Admin Control Panel - Departments") to display.

data.name: Tip_SlideshowMode.Text
data.value:
Expand "Slideshow effect selection tips" section to view detail explanation for each slideshow effect, also visit http://DnnModule.com to watch online demos for each slideshow.

You can also create classicial banners (slideshow) with this sub module, expand "How to create classical banners (slideshow)" section for more detail.

Note, all slideshow effect requires at least 2 products (with image provide) to work properly.

data.name: Tip_SlideshowMode_Flow.Text
data.value: Carrousel Flow Gallery is a Ready-to-Use-and-Deploy ajax image Gallery application which allows an intuitive image handling. The basic idea is to digitally animate the thumbing through a physical image stack. The intuitive handling is automatically caused by the metaphorical use of the well known process of thumbing through.

data.name: Tip_SlideshowMode_Unslider.Text
data.value: Unslider is a super-tiny JQuery slider. It is a Cross-browser campatible, Keyboard support, and responsive slider.

data.name: plUnslider_Delay.Help
data.value: The delay between slide animations (in milliseconds)

data.name: plUnslider_Fluid.Help
data.value: Support responsive design. May break non-responsive designs.

data.name: plUnslider_Speed.Help
data.value: The speed to animate each slide (in milliseconds)

data.name: plUnslider_ImageWidth.Help
data.value: Specify product image width if "Show product image as background" option is unchecked.

data.name: Tip_ModifyUnsliderCss.Text
data.value: Try modify DesktopModules\CrossClassified\Slideshow\UnSlider\unslider.css if you want to customize it.

data.name: Tip_Unslider_ImageWidth.Text
data.value: Specify product image width if "Show product image as background" option is unchecked.

data.name: Tip_Unslider_ShowImageAsBackground.Text
data.value: By default, module will show product image as slider background. Uncheck this option if it doesn't look well while displaying your product images.

data.name: plUnslider_ShowSummary.Help
data.value: Check to show product summary in slideshow

data.name: plBootstrapCarousel_Interval.Help
data.value: The amount of time to delay between automatically cycling an item. Default value is 5000

data.name: plBootstrapCarousel_RefLibrary.Help
data.value: Uncheck this option if your skin file already includes Bootstrap javascript library. For example, if you use DNN built-in "Gravity" skin, just uncheck this option to avoid duplicate reference.

data.name: plBootstrapCarousel_ShowSummary.Help
data.value: Check to show summary in slideshow

data.name: plBootstrapCarousel_ShowTitle.Help
data.value: Check to show title in slideshow

data.name: plGalleria_Autoplay.Help
data.value: type: Boolean or Number, default: 5000. If true, this will start playing the slideshow with 5 seconds interval (default). If you set this to any number, f.ex 4000, it will start playing with that interval (in milliseconds)

data.name: plGalleria_Height.Help
data.value:
type: Number, default: 0. Galleria need a height to work properly. You can set the height using this option to make sure it has the correct height. If no height is set, Galleria will try to find the height of the parent container.

You can set an exact value, f.ex 200, and it will apply this exact height in pixels. You can also set a relative ratio (e.g, 0.5625) value which is anything below 2. If you set a relative ratio value, the gallery height will be calculated by multiplying this value with the width at any given scaling process. This is very useful when programming responsive layouts.

data.name: plGalleria_Lightbox.Help
data.value: type: Boolean, default: false. This option acts as a helper for attaching a lightbox when the user clicks on an image.

data.name: plGalleria_Responsive.Help
data.value: type: Boolean, default: true. This option sets thew Gallery in responsive mode. That means that it will resize the entire container if your CSS is dynamic. In other words, you can add media queries or dynamic proportions in your CSS and the gallery will follow these proportions as the window resizes.

data.name: plGalleria_Width.Help
data.value: Number or String, default value is "auto". By default, Galleria fetches the width from the containing element. Bu you can use this option to set a gallery width manually.

data.name: plLiteAccordion_ImageWidth.Help
data.value: Specify image width if necessary. Leave it as blank will show image with its original width.

data.name: plLiteAccordion_ShowSummary.Help
data.value: Check to show summary in slideshow

data.name: plLiteAccordion_Theme.Help
data.value: basic, dark, light, colorful, or stitch

data.name: plSlidorion_HoverPause.Help
data.value: The slidorion pauses when hovered over (boolean)

data.name: plSlidorion_ImageWidth.Help
data.value: Specify image width if necessary. Leave it as blank will show image with its original width.

data.name: plSummaryLength.Help
data.value: Enter maximun summary length, enter 0 to not limit it.

data.name: plTitleLength.Help
data.value: Enter maximun title length, enter 0 to not limit it.

data.name: plUnslider_BackgroundRepeat.Help
data.value: If show image as background, specify its "background-repeat" property here.

data.name: Tip_BootstrapCarousel_RefLibrary.Text
data.value: Uncheck this option if your skin file already includes Bootstrap javascript library. For example, if you use DNN built-in "Gravity" skin, just uncheck this option to avoid duplicate reference.

data.name: Tip_Galleria_Lightbox.Text
data.value: This option acts as a helper for attaching a lightbox when the user clicks on an image.

data.name: Tip_ImageSize.Text
data.value: Specify image size (widht/height) while displaying in slideshow, this is useful in some situations.

data.name: Tip_LiteAccordion_ShowSummary.Text
data.value: If checked, module will show photo title/image and summary in slideshow. Uncheck it to show photo title/image only.

data.name: Tip_SlideshowMode_BootstrapCarousel.Text
data.value: "Bootstrap Carousel" is the most popular photo slideshow style. It shows image, title and summary, also shows navigate button to let visitors to switch slides.

data.name: Tip_SlideshowMode_Galleria.Text
data.value: "Galleria" is a JavaScript image gallery framework that simplifies the process of creating beautiful image galleries for the web and mobile devices.

data.name: Tip_SlideshowMode_LiteAccordion.Text
data.value: "Lite Accordion" is a horizontal accordion plugin for jQuery. It works better when all photo images are in same size (width and height)

data.name: Tip_SlideshowMode_NumericRotator.Text
data.value: "Numeric Rotator" works very similar as the "CrossPhoto_ListDashboard" sub module. But unlike "CrossPhoto_ListDashboard" sub module (which is Flash based), the "Numeric Rotator" slideshow is fully javascript based.

data.name: Tip_SlideshowMode_Slidorion.Text
data.value: A combination of an image slider and an accordion, the "Slidorion" displays beautiful images along with a variable length description. It works better when all photo images are in same size (width and height).

data.name: plUnslider_ShowImageOnly.Help
data.value: Check to only show images in slideshow

data.name: plPgwGallery_adaptiveDuration.Help
data.value: This duration is the period in milliseconds, during the adjustment of the previous option runs (if it is activated).

data.name: plPgwGallery_autoSlide.Help
data.value: Enable or disable the automatic transition between the images of the gallery.

data.name: plPgwGallery_displayControls.Help
data.value: On the main container, this option sets a button on each side to display the previous or next image.

data.name: plPgwGallery_displayList.Help
data.value: This option displays or not the thumbnail list of the gallery elements.

data.name: plPgwGallery_intervalDuration.Help
data.value: Interval in milliseconds before displaying of the next image. This option requires "autoSlide" option activated.

data.name: plPgwGallery_mainClassName.Help
data.value: This option overrides the default CSS class of the Gallery.

data.name: plPgwGallery_maxHeight.Help
data.value: Enter max height of your gallery.

data.name: plPgwGallery_touchControls.Help
data.value: If this parameter is activated, the main container binds the touch movements and displays the previous or next slide. (Only the mobile devices send these events)

data.name: plPgwGallery_transitionDuration.Help
data.value: Period of animation in milliseconds between 2 images.

data.name: plPgwGallery_transitionEffect.Help
data.value: You can choose between 2 different transition effects: "fading" or "sliding".

data.name: plPgwSlider_adaptiveDuration.Help
data.value: This duration is the period in milliseconds, during the adjustment of the previous option runs (if it is activated).

data.name: plPgwSlider_adaptiveHeight.Help
data.value: If your images have a different height, this option adjusts automatically the global height of the slider.

data.name: plPgwSlider_autoSlide.Help
data.value: Enable or disable the automatic transition between the images of the slider.

data.name: plPgwSlider_displayControls.Help
data.value: On the main container, this option sets a button on each side to display the previous or next image.

data.name: plPgwSlider_displayList.Help
data.value: This option displays or not the list of the slider elements. To choose the position, see the option "listPosition".

data.name: plPgwSlider_intervalDuration.Help
data.value: Interval in milliseconds before displaying of the next image. This option requires "autoSlide" option activated.

data.name: plPgwSlider_listPosition.Help
data.value: To choose the position of the list, you can set this option to "left" or "right". If you want to disable the displaying of the list, see the option "displayList".

data.name: plPgwSlider_mainClassName.Help
data.value: This option overrides the default CSS class of the slider.

data.name: plPgwSlider_maxHeight.Help
data.value: Enter max height of your slider.

data.name: plPgwSlider_selectionMode.Help
data.value: This option sets the selection mode of the current element, it can be set to "click" or "mouseOver". "mouseOver" is only active with the transition effect "fading"

data.name: plPgwSlider_touchControls.Help
data.value: If this parameter is activated, the main container binds the touch movements and displays the previous or next slide. (Only the mobile devices send these events)

data.name: plPgwSlider_transitionDuration.Help
data.value: Period of animation in milliseconds between 2 images.

data.name: plPgwSlider_transitionEffect.Help
data.value: You can choose between 2 different transition effects: "fading" or "sliding".

data.name: plPgwSlider_verticalCentering.Help
data.value: If the height of the list or the main container is smaller than the height of the image, this option can vertically center the element. To activate, this option must be set to "true".

data.name: Tip_PgwGallery_LimitHeight.Text
data.value: If you want to set a maximum height to your gallery, you can check on "Limit max height" option, and enter a integer value as "Max Height".

data.name: Tip_PgwSlider_LimitHeight.Text
data.value: If you want to set a maximum height to your slider, you can check on "Limit max height" option, and enter a integer value as "Max Height".

data.name: Tip_SlideshowMode_PgwGallery.Text
data.value: "Pgw Gallery" is a responsive slideshow / gallery / carousel for jQuery. It is all browsers supported (desktop and mobile devices) and also SEO compliant.

data.name: Tip_SlideshowMode_PgwSlider.Text
data.value: "Pgw Slider" is a responsive slider for jQuery. It is all browsers supported (desktop and mobile devices) and also SEO compliant.

data.name: li_SlideshowMode_OwlCarousel.Text
data.value: Owl Carousel (supports multiple items per slide)

data.name: plOwlCarousel_autoplayTimeout.Help
data.value: Auto Play Timeout, default value is 5000

data.name: plOwlCarousel_autoWidth.Help
data.value: Set non grid content. Try using width style on divs.

data.name: plOwlCarousel_center.Help
data.value: Center item. Works well with even an odd number of items.

data.name: plOwlCarousel_items.Help
data.value: How many items will be shown per slide

data.name: plOwlCarousel_items_1200.Help
data.value: When screen width is between 980 - 1200, how many items to show per slide

data.name: plOwlCarousel_items_480.Help
data.value: When screen width is lower than 480, how many items to show per slide

data.name: plOwlCarousel_items_768.Help
data.value: When screen width is between 480 - 768, how many items to show per slide

data.name: plOwlCarousel_items_980.Help
data.value: When screen width is between 768 - 980, how many items to show per slide

data.name: plOwlCarousel_items_than1200.Help
data.value: When screen width > 1200, how many items to show per slide

data.name: plOwlCarousel_loop.Help
data.value: Inifnity loop. Duplicate last and first items to get loop illusion.

data.name: plOwlCarousel_responsive.Help
data.value: Check on "Responsive Support" option to support respinsive layout.

data.name: plOwlCarousel_stagePadding.Help
data.value: Padding left and right on stage (can see neighbours).

data.name: Tip_OwlCarousel_ImageSize.Text
data.value:
Specify the image size below (width, height). Note, besides integer values, you can also specify other valid values like 100%,auto, etc.
By default, module will show image thumbnail in slide, choose "Show Original Image" option if you want to show original image (for example, you want to show 1 item only in slide, and you need a big image size).

data.name: Tip_OwlCarousel_Responsive.Text
data.value: "Owl Carousel" is Responsive layout based. To support responsive, 1. Check on "Responsive Support" option. 2. Specify how many items to show under different screen width, for example, if you enter "6" in "Screen Width > 1200", then it will show 6 items per slide when visitor device width is bigger than 1200px. Note, check on the "Responsive Support" will ignore the "Items per slide" value.

data.name: Tip_SlideshowMode_OwlCarousel.Text
data.value: "Owl Carousel", a Touch enabled jQuery plugin that lets you create beautiful responsive carousel slider. It supports multiple items per slide.

data.name: plRevolutionSlider_Delay.Help
data.value: The speed to animate each slide (in milliseconds)

data.name: plRevolutionSlider_hideAllCaptionAtLilmit.Help
data.value: Hide all The Captions if Width of Browser is less then this value

data.name: plRevolutionSlider_hideCaptionAtLimit.Help
data.value: It Defines if a caption should be shown under a Screen Resolution ( Basod on The Width of Browser)

data.name: plRevolutionSlider_hideSliderAtLimit.Help
data.value: Hide the whole slider, and stop also functions if Width of Browser is less than this value

data.name: plRevolutionSlider_navigationStyle.Help
data.value: round,square,navbar,round-old,square-old,navbar-old, or any from the list in the docu (choose between 50+ different item), custom

data.name: plRevolutionSlider_onHoverStop.Help
data.value: Stop Banner Timet at Hover on Slide

data.name: plRevolutionSlider_stopAfterLoops.Help
data.value: Stop Timer if All slides has been played "x" times. IT will stop at THe slide which is defined via stopAtSlide:x, if set to -1 slide never stop automatic.

data.name: plRevolutionSlider_stopAtSlide.Help
data.value: Stop Timer if Slide "x" has been Reached. If stopAfterLoops set to 0, then it stops already in the first Loop at slide X which defined. -1 means do not stop at any slide. stopAfterLoops has no sinn in this case.

data.name: Tip_RevolutionSlider_Thumb.Text
data.value: Thumbnail Width/Height/Amount works only if navigation type set to "Thumbnail"

data.name: Tip_SlideshowMode_RevolutionSlider.Text
data.value: "Revolution Slider" is a a responsive(mobile friendly) or fullwidth slider with must-see-effects and meanwhile keep or build your SEO optimization (all content always readable for search engines).

data.name: Tip_About.Text
data.value:
Classified Pro is an enterprise-class DNN module which helps you to create an online store, auction website and also publish classified ads. It contains 16 sub modules and 1 skin object. Cp_Product_Slideshow is one of these 16 sub modules, it is used to show products (listings) with JavaScript slideshow. When click a slide, module will navigate to Cp_Product_Detail sub module page to show product (listing) detail. Since it is JavaScript based, it can also be run under mobile and tablet pc.

You can add multiple instances of Cp_Product_Slideshow sub module to different pages (or on same page), and configure them to show different slideshows.

If current site enables content localization, Cp_Product_Slideshow sub module will show content according to page culture. For example, if current page culture is "en-US (English)", it will show English content of products; if current page culture is "zh-CN (Simple Chinese)", it will show Simple Chinese content of products; if page culture is neutral, it will show content according to current context culture.
